Package com.shashi.service

Interface OrderService

All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderServiceImpl
public interface OrderService
Service interface for managing order and transaction operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addOrder(OrderBean order)
    Adds a single order record to the database.
    boolean
    addTransaction(TransactionBean transaction)
    Adds a transaction record to the database.
    int
    countSoldItem(String prodId)
    Counts the total number of times a specific product has been sold.
    List<OrderDetails>
    getAllOrderDetails(String userEmailId)
    Retrieves detailed information about all orders for a specific user.

  • Method Details

    • paymentSuccess

      String paymentSuccess(String userName, double paidAmount)
      Processes a successful payment and creates corresponding order and transaction records.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the customer.
      paidAmount - The total amount paid.
      Returns:
      A status message indicating the success or failure of the order placement.

    • addOrder

      boolean addOrder(OrderBean order)
      Adds a single order record to the database.
      Parameters:
      order - The OrderBean object to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the order was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • addTransaction

      boolean addTransaction(TransactionBean transaction)
      Adds a transaction record to the database.
      Parameters:
      transaction - The TransactionBean object to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the transaction was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • countSoldItem

      int countSoldItem(String prodId)
      Counts the total number of times a specific product has been sold.
      Parameters:
      prodId - The ID of the product.
      Returns:
      The total quantity of the product sold.

    • getAllOrders

      List<OrderBean> getAllOrders()
      Retrieves a list of all orders from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of OrderBean objects.

    • getOrdersByUserId

      List<OrderBean> getOrdersByUserId(String emailId)
      Retrieves all orders placed by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      emailId - The email ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of OrderBean objects for the specified user.

    • getAllOrderDetails

      List<OrderDetails> getAllOrderDetails(String userEmailId)
      Retrieves detailed information about all orders for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userEmailId - The email ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of OrderDetails objects, containing comprehensive order information.

    • shipNow

      String shipNow(String orderId, String prodId)
      Marks a specific order item as shipped.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order.
      prodId - The ID of the product within the order.
      Returns:
      A status message indicating the success or failure of the shipping update.
